Detailed Description

The C++ wrapper for the nitf_MemorySource.

The memory source class allows us to read directly from a data buffer. In the event that this is a memory-mapped file, we will likely get a performance gain over the direct fd approach.

The constructor takes in a buffer, a size, and optionally a sampling factor (Typically, the factor will be applied most times during the case of memory mapping, although it may be used to sample down or cut the image into pieces).
